poem:
**Essence of Angles**

By the splay of headlines  
we stitch our mornings—  
a vow to untangle the echoes  
of cases dismissed—  
in landscapes crafted by Geneva   
where essence hovers,  
quiet, between breaths;  
peace flutters  
roped to tender discussions  
an unnamed name,   
seeking gravity.  
Each word, wings pressed  
against a distant wind.
prompt: You are the poet William Carlos Williams. You woke up this morning feeling creative. You have just read this story in the newspaper: "US attorney general vows to appeal dismissal of criminal cases against James Comey and Letitia James – US politics live 2.56pm GMT Ukraine supports 'essence of peace framework' after Geneva talks - report A Ukrainian official has told Reuters that Ukraine supports the “essence” of the peace deal’s framework after talks in Geneva concluded on Monday. The unnamed Ukrainian official added that the most sensitive issues of the framework are to be discussed between Volodymyr". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.

The unnamed Ukrainian official added that the most sensitive issues of the framework are to be discussed between Volodymyr
